sentences.sContent: It is not restricted to egoistic goals, much less to economic goals.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is not restricted to egoistic goals, much less to economic goals.
sentences.sCn: 它并不限于那种自私自利的目标，也不仅仅是经济上的目标。

sentences.sContent: The dangers of introspection exist mostly if he is to revel in egoistic thoughts.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dangers of introspection exist mostly if he is to revel in egoistic thoughts.
sentences.sCn: 如果你想要通过自省揭示自私自利的想法，潜藏的危险更大。

sentences.sContent: This is probably the only aspect of life where egoistic adults can leave their success, money, freedom and independence behind for just another chance.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is probably the only aspect of life where egoistic adults can leave their success, money, freedom and independence behind for just another chance.
sentences.sCn: 这一点也许是唯一能让自私自利的成年人抛去成功、金钱、自由以及独立性以求新生。

synos.tran: 自私自利的，自我中心的

remMethod.val: ego(我) + istic → 以我为中心的 → 自我主义的

words.tran: 自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
自我主义者；利己主义者

trans.tranCn: 自私自利的，自我中心的
